snippet: The American Jewish Joint Distribution Committee is providing digital access to a trove of materials sought after by scholars, genealogists and Holocaust refugees and their descendants.
abstract: American Jewish Joint Distribution Committee is providing online digital access to its archives, sought after by scholars, genealogists and Holocaust refugees and their descendants.
lead_paragraph: The American Jewish Joint Distribution Committee is providing digital access to a trove of materials sought after by scholars, genealogists and Holocaust refugees and their descendants.

headline.seo: Jewish Archives on 20th-Century Diaspora Are Going Online
headline.main: Archives on a 20th-Century Diaspora Are Being Put Online
headline.print_headline: Archives on a 20th-Century Diaspora Are Being Put Online
